lessons.title: The Basics of the Piano
lessons.description: Learn about keys, notes, and start playing simple tunes. Perfect for beginners ready to make music on the piano!
information: A piano is one of the most basic and vital instruments to understanding music on a fundamental level. Its ease of use and beautiful sound make it an enticing starting point for beginners. Today, we will show the very basics of understanding notes and playing them on a piano.

Knowing what the notes are is the first step in understanding anything about music. The notes on the piano are ABCDEFG (white notes specifically), and this sequence repeats as you go up and down the piano. These are also all the notes used in the majority of all popular music created today. The repetition of these notes are called octaves. To understand where each note is on the piano, see the grouping of two black keys as Chopsticks, and the grouping of three black keys as a Fork. The white notes to the left of those groupings are a C and F respectively.

Most popular songs have core elements to them which together create the song itself. One of these elements is the melody. Any catchy pop song usually has a very strong melody, which is usually composed of singular notes sung by someone or played on an instrument. Try playing the interactive keyboard we have and see if you can come up with a melody!

Let’s try to play one of the most classic and simple tunes that pretty much everyone should know. The alphabet song! This song only uses 5 notes (C, D, E, F and G), so it should be quite easy to learn. Let’s play this sequence.  Sequence (computer keys, to the tune of the Alphabet Song): AAFFGGF FFDDSSSSA GGF DDS GGGF DDS AAFFGGF FFDDSSA

lessons.title: Octave Odyssey
lessons.description: Explore the concept of octaves, understanding their role in creating musical depth. Ideal for beginners curious about expanding their musical range!

lessons.title: Interval Insight
lessons.description: Demystify musical intervals and discover how they shape melody and harmony. An intermediate lesson providing insights into the language of music!

lessons.title: Chords Unleashed
lessons.description: Unlock the world of chords, understanding how multiple notes come together to create harmony. A concise intermediate lesson for those eager to enhance their chord vocabulary!

lessons.title: Scale Mastery
lessons.description: Master the essential scales that form the foundation of musical fluency. An intermediate lesson providing key insights into mastering scales effortlessly!

lessons.title: Piano Keys: Beyond the Basics
lessons.description: Take your piano skills to the next level by exploring advanced techniques for playing in different keys. A longer intermediate lesson for those ready to expand their musical horizons!

lessons.title: Harmony in Action
lessons.description: Apply chords practically, learning how to accompany melodies and create a harmonious musical landscape. An intermediate lesson for hands-on experience with harmonies!

lessons.title: Scales Galore
lessons.description: Dive deep into various scales, including major, minor, and pentatonic, enhancing your musical versatility. An expert-level lesson for those seeking in-depth scale knowledge!

lessons.title: Piano Pulse: Rhythms and Beats
lessons.description: Discover the heartbeat of piano playing, focusing on rhythms, beats, and how to infuse life into your music. Perfect for beginners looking to enhance their musical pulse!
